name: Super Bonk
description: Super Bonk (released in Europe as Super B.C. Kid and in Japan as Chō Genjin) is a 1994 2D platform video game by Hudson Soft for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. It is the fourth game in the Bonk series. The game was later re-released for the Wii Virtual Console in Japan and Europe in 2010 and in North America in 2011.
